name: Smith Vantage MIPS Snow Helmet - Men's
description: Charge your stoke to 100%. This helmet offers premium protection in a light, extremely comfortable and well vented package. MIPS (Multi-directional Impact Protection System) technology reduces the rotating forces on your head on the event of a crash, giving you peace of mind during strategic risk-taking on the hill. AirEvac 2 ventilation capabilities and 21 physical vents provide impressive and evenly distributed airflow, keeping heat away from your goggles the whole ride down.Hybrid SL shell construction is part ABS part polycarbonate for a light and durable helmet.Aerocore™ construction featuring Koroyd® is designed to absorb more impact than traditionnal helmets.Two adjustable vent controls allows for a perfectly tuned warmth level.MIPS helps with the reduction of rotational forces in the event of a crash.Adjustable Boa® 360 fit system provides a precise and comfortable fit.AirEvac 2 ventilation takes the warm air away from your goggles through external and internal vents.21 vents keeps your head cool.Nanosilver performance lining keeps your helmet smelling fresh for longer.Earpads are removable and can be used with Outdoor Tech™ CHIPS® and WIRED CHIPS® audio systems (not included).
